description: A letter grade is used to rate traffic services. This maintenance program ensures that stripes on traffic lanes are clearly marked, highway signs are visible, traffic signals are functioning properly and guardrails are intact and functioning.

name: Traffic Services Maintenance - Striping, Signs, Signals, and Guardrail Maintenance
